description.en:
Lotoblock aims to build a fair, transparent and diversified next-generation decentralized prediction market and platform.

Eco-friendly:Developers can use popular languages and massive basic libraries to build applications.

Artificial intelligence:Through AI technology, introducing more external information into the blockchain system to realize intelligent AI oracle and intelligent riskcontrol.

Secure and transparent:Relying on blockchain technology to ensure trustworthiness and expose the source code on github.

High-performance:With Lotomatrix’ sidechain technology, Lotoblock can flexibly allocate sidechains, ensuring high performance and high availability of DGAME.
